title: Calcium Citrate Maleate
overview: Calcium citrate maleate (CCM) is a water-soluble organic compound that combines calcium citrate with maleic acid. It is a highly bioavailable source of calcium designed to support bone health and address calcium deficiencies.
features: High Bioavailability: CCM's unique structure allows for efficient calcium absorption, even in individuals with low stomach acid or digestive issues
Water-soluble: Dissolves readily, making it convenient for individuals who dislike swallowing large tablets or capsules
Potential Kidney Health Support: Citrate and maleate components may help prevent the formation of kidney stones in some individuals
Versatile Applications: Can be incorporated into tablets, capsules, powders, or liquids

applications.title: Pharmaceutical
applications.description: Treatment and prevention of calcium deficiencies and osteoporosis

applications.title: Nutraceutical
applications.description: May be particularly beneficial for individuals with compromised digestion or risk of kidney stones
